[CONTINUED]    ...to that bathroom and he says "Sooorry, I'm not actually a nice guy..." then something about "I'll make sure to kill you before you [can't read what it says]. You can tell (if you couldn't already) that he's a pretty fucked up guy... more like how does he even rip their limbs off? With his bare hands? Anyway, 5th girl says "Um, old man, could you not walk behind me, etc. etc. (you get the idea by now)" and then says "Oh, you're scouting for models? I'll go, I'll go!" then the when she gets cut he says "What the fuck you saying, brat?" "You kids have it lucky, you call guys like me criminals and they (guessing that's the police) listen to anything you say" "I'll make sure you die a slow, painful death" ... so yeah, that's about it. All the girls are saying "sorry" or "please forgive me" (well third girl says "I'll fucking kill you! Fucking businessman scum! Criminal!). Either way, he didn't have to go that far...

For those who can't read the text, all of the girls he sees/meets, are telling him that he's creeping them out. For instance the third girl is saying "Could you not walk down the same street as me? It's really gross". They all see him (at least initially) as a hanzaisha (犯罪者) - a criminal and he gets triggered when that happens. 

The first girl gets beat because she tells a lie to the guy that she is 20. He then says something like "Don't fuck with adults asking you questions!"

2nd girl says "The disgusting old man over there!" "Could you distance yourself from me?" "It's making me very uneasy" so he beats her and says something like "You want to say that again [to a guy minding his business]?" and then something about shoving something in her back hole.

3rd girl I've already explained.

4th girl is actually alright. He asks why she's got her umbrella out and she says "Oh, it's not raining anymore?". She then asks the "優しいおじさん" - 'kind old man' for directions and he probably led her
